name: Coffee Run (itch) (EmptyGames)
description:
Details

Really just a test to see what all I can do within a 2 week time frame. A nice little bench mark, and though it DEFINITELY needs polish, I'm still happy with the results. 

Use the left and right arrow keys to move, and spavebar to jump. Interact with menu buttons via mouse.

Install instructions

You will need to decompress or extract the file.
